summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of $11.95 from Local Improvement District Fund No. 432 to be paid Ada C. Adsen amount paid by her in error as the 4th installment of an assessment against certain property in block 53, replat of blocks 44 to 53 inclusive, Mercer's Second Addition to North Seattle, and directing the City Treasurer to reinstate said assessment on the rolls of said district as unpaid.
